title: Why am I getting chat blocked in almost every champ select in blind pick?
body:
Hey,
Almost every time I play blind pick I get chat blocked when trying to call my position. I don't spam, usually just type mid once or twice, haven't been banned for months and have never been chat banned. This happens almost every game to the point where if I want any position other than sup I  need to party with a friend and have them call it. Does anyone know a way around this or how to fix it?
Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

This definitely sounds like a connection issue to me, however let's rule out the possibility of a client issue first.
Could you please [run a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) on your client to ensure there are no corrupt files.

Now onto the potential connection issues;
Could you [switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) and let me know if that helps, if not we can explore further potential fixes for this issue.
I already am using that. Any other suggestions? I am using a wired connection btw

Apologies for the delayed response.

Did you attempt the client repair?

I'm pretty sure this is usually a result of connection issues, it's not any sort of punishment so don't worry about that. 

As to how to find out what's up/fix it, one of the wrenchmen or someone else who knows will jump in soon I imagine.
